author: Rohit Arora, CEO and co-founder of Biz2Credit
title: Here's how you can quickly raise your credit score and land a small business loan
description: Despite lenders' seeming willingness to grant loan requests, many small business owners are declined, especially those with less-than-stellar credit histories. Here are six expert tips that can make all the difference.
content: The past two years have been halcyon times for small businesses searching for capital. The lending landscape has never been higher during the post-recession era, and approval rates have increased steadily at big banks, regional and community banks and at inst… [+10524 chars]
